formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: DATABASE DELTREE <family> [keytree] Deletes a family or specific keytree within a family in the Asterisk database. Returns 1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -2,3 +2,4 @@ Deletes a family or specific keytree within a family in the Asterisk database. Returns 1 if successful, 0 otherwise. + Runs Dead : Yes
